entity.touhou_little_maid.maid.tip: Tame a maid with a cake and you are able to assist them with their tasks you choose. Look in Memorizable Gensokyo to learn more about it.
entity.touhou_little_maid.fairy.tip: Flies and shoots danmaku at you. Drops power points when killed.
entity.touhou_little_maid.broom.tip: Requires a maid mounted on a broom in order to fly across the sky. Be advised some flying hostile mobs will still reach you such as Maid Fairies or Phantoms.
item.touhou_little_maid.power_point.tip: Power Points are found as loot, throw it to receive power points.
item.touhou_little_maid.broom.tip: Requires a maid mounted on a broom in order to fly across the sky. Be advised some flying hostile mobs will still reach you such as Maid Fairies or Phantoms.
item.touhou_little_maid.maid_backpack_sm: Expands your maid's inventory slots up to 12.
item.touhou_little_maid.maid_backpack_mi: Expands your maid's inventory slots up to 24.
item.touhou_little_maid.maid_backpack_bi: Expands your maid's inventory slots up to 36.
item.touhou_little_maid.explosion_protec: Gives maid resistance to explosion damage.
item.touhou_little_maid.fall_protect_bau: Gives maid resistance to fall damage.
item.touhou_little_maid.drown_protect_ba: Gives maid resistance to drown damage.
item.touhou_little_maid.fire_protect_bau: Gives maid resistance to burning damage.
item.touhou_little_maid.mute_bauble.tip: Silence your maid if you're not a fan of their frequent talking.
item.touhou_little_maid.nimble_fabric.ti: Gives maid the ability to dodge incoming projectiles by teleporting.
item.touhou_little_maid.crafting_table_b: Expands your maid's inventory slots up to 18. Makes your maid a portable Crafting Table.
item.touhou_little_maid.furnace_backpack: Expands your maid's inventory slots up to 18. Makes your maid a portable Furnace.
item.touhou_little_maid.hakurei_gohei.ti: A gohei used for creating an altar after you constructed it. Maids holding this gohei can shoot danmaku at hostile monsters.
item.touhou_little_maid.sanae_gohei.tip: A gohei used for creating an altar after you constructed it. Maids holding this gohei can shoot danmaku at hostile monsters.
item.touhou_little_maid.film.tip: Your maid is deceased. to revive them, Place this in the altar along with a Gold Ingot, Iron Ingot, Lapis Lazuli, Coal, and Redstone on each pillar, or place it in the Shrine
item.touhou_little_maid.wireless_io.tip: Gap is configurable to send items from chest to maid, or vice versa.
item.touhou_little_maid.picnic_basket.ti: Up to four maids will enjoy a picnic when they are idle. Be sure to load this basket with food. This increases favorability with your maids.
block.touhou_little_maid.gomoku.tip: Challenge your maid to a Gomoku board game. Are you able to outsmart your maid in this board game?
block.touhou_little_maid.maid_bed.tip: Maids rest on this bed when it’s time to sleep. This increases favorability with your maid.
block.touhou_little_maid.shrine.tip: Shrines are found in any loot chest at a rare rate. They can be used for resurrecting your maid, and will reduce your health to one.
block.touhou_little_maid.computer.tip: This brings joy and increases favorability of your maid.
block.touhou_little_maid.keyboard.tip: This brings joy and increases favorability of your maid.
block.touhou_little_maid.bookshelf.tip: This brings joy and increases favorability of your maid.
block.touhou_little_maid.scarecrow.tip: When placed on the ground, it prevents fairy maids from spawning in a square area.
Right click on the top of a block to place it.

Before reporting a bug, please remove Optifine first and check again to see if the bug is still present.

Optifine-related issues are not solvable on Touhou Little Maid's end!

You can use Oculus and Embeddium mods as alternatives to Optifine.

task.touhou_little_maid.attack.desc: Maid will melee attack surrounding hostile mobs

task.touhou_little_maid.grass.desc: Maid will clean up the surrounding flowers or grass
task.touhou_little_maid.snow.desc: Maid will clean up the surrounding snow. When holding a shovel, collect snowballs
task.touhou_little_maid.feed.desc: Maid will feed food to the master when they are hungry
task.touhou_little_maid.shears.desc: Maid will try to shear the surrounding creatures
task.touhou_little_maid.milk.desc: Maid will try to collect milk from surrounding cows with a bucket
task.touhou_little_maid.torch.desc: Maid will try to place torches in the darker places around

task.touhou_little_maid.extinguishing.de: Maid will try to extinguish the surrounding fire
task.touhou_little_maid.board_games.desc: Maid will search around the game board
task.touhou_little_maid.gun_attack.desc: Maid is able to use the TacZ gun
task.touhou_little_maid.fishing.desc: The maid will look for a chair around and sit on them, and then start fishing

patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.name: Memorizable Gensokyo
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.landin: A mod about the maid and the touhou project.$(br2)Thanks to Snownee for help in coding. $(br)Thanks to Succinum, Pajinyi, ZeniCrow, Tian_mi, Paulzzh, Yuriscat and other artists for producing excellent models and textures.$(br)Thanks to Verclene, the author of little maid mob mod.
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.catego: Introduced the basic functions of the maid
Introduce the overview content of this mod
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entrie: Backpack

The backpack can be used to expand the inventory of the maid. It can be applied by holding the backpack and right-clicking on the maid. The backpack has three levels. $(br2)Use shears to remove the maid's backpack.
Maid with a small backpack.
Item Magnet
A bauble that can expand the pickup range. $(br2)After being equipped, the maid's pickup range of items, arrows, experience orb, and power points will be greatly increased.
Maid Base

There are many basic functions that maids are able to perform, such as:$(li)By default, the maid will actively pick up items, arrows and experience orbs around her. The main GUI has a button to switch pick up mode;$(li)By default, the maid will always follow the player.

$(li)Crouch right-clicking a maid with an empty hand can switch sitting mode. In sitting mode, maid doesn't do anything, including avoiding danger.$(li)When the maid rides on other entities, Crouch right-clicking with an empty hand can dismount them.$(li)The player can use a golden apple or potion on a maid by crouch right-click them while holding the item.

$(li)The experience picked up by the maid can be converted into an Bottle o' Enchanting if the player right-clicks the maid while holding a bottle.$(li)The maid can equip the skull and render the model of it.$(li)Right-click the maid with an empty name tag, and you can name them directly.$(li)When the maid holds the temptation item for animals, she is able to attract surrounding animals.
$(li)Use the saddle to right-click on the maid to carry the maid in yours arms.$(li)Creepers will avoid maids.
Maid Bauble

This mod provides several baubles that can be triggered to protect maids under certain conditions. They need to be place in the bauble inventory.$(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: Can be used 6 times to avoid a maid's death.

$(li)Protect Bauble: When the maid receives the corresponding damage, the damage event is canceled.$(li)Nimble Fabric: When a maid equipped with this bauble is hit by a projectile, she will teleport like an enderman.
Maid Config
This mod adds a lot of configuration for maids. You can set some attributes of the maids, and limit the maximum number of maids that can be tamed by the player.
Maid Skin

The maids' skin is completely customizable, you can easily change the maids' skin in game.$(br2)you can also add a third-party resource pack to further personalize the maid's skin.$(br2)Use the $(l:https://blockbench.net/)Blockbench$(/l) software to easily create your own maid skin resource pack, and place the package in the $(#f00)tlm_custom_pack$() folder under the game directory.
Click the button in the picture to open the maid skin GUI.
Maid Sound
You can make custom sound resources packs to replace or expand the maid's sound effects.
Click the button in the picture to open the maid sound GUI.
Maid Task

When you open a maid's GUI, you can see a maid task button. Click it to switch the maid's task.$(br2)You can also click the schedule button to switch the maid's schedule so that it can work, rest or sleep in different time periods.
Click the button in the lower right corner of the image to switch pictures
Mute Bauble
After being equipped with this bauble, the maid will become very quiet.
Naming Eggs

A specially named maid can display a special model.$(br2)By default, a maid named with $(#ff0000)=>id$() can become the player skin model corresponding to that id.$(br2)The maid resource pack can also add custom model eggs, even SHA1 encrypted model eggs.
Maid with the name $(#ff0000)=>Notch$().
Spawn Maid

The way to get a maid is very special and needs to be done through a multi-block altar.$(br2)Since the recipe is likely to change in the future, please check the JEI altar label.$(br2)After the maid is successfully spawned in a multi-block altar, you will get a cake box wrapped with the maid, just right-click the cake box to open it.

You need to right-click three times to trigger different opening stages, and finally the cake box will disappear.$(br2)You will need a cake to tame the maid. the taming items can be changed in the configuration file.$(br2)The tamed maid is almost identical to a vanilla pet, and you can right-click to open her GUI.
Substitute Jizo
Substitute jizo is a creative mode item that can give invincible mode when right-clicked on a maid.
Maid Home
When the home mode button is clicked, the maid will record the current position and move within a range around it. (default range:12, can be modified in the config file)
Film
The maid will drop a film after death, and the film can be used in an altar to resurrect the maid.$(br2)Film cannot be destroyed by fire or lava.
Gap

A bauble that can transport items. $(br2)You can right-click a chest with the gap to mark it, then open its GUI to make some settings, and finally place it in the maid's bauble inventory. $(br2)After this, the maid will take out/deposit the specified items "wirelessly" from the chest.
You can use the compass to see the maid's home position
Snowball Fight
When the maid is on snow and in an idle task, the maid throws snowballs at the player or other maids
Chat Bubbles
The maid occasionally displays several chat bubbles
Other Backpack
Some backpacks have other functions, such as the crafting table backpack, furnace backpack, and ender chest backpack
Maid Task Area
Kappa's compass is a tool that can set a maid's task area. You can use it to set the places where the maid works, rests or sleeps.
First you need to right click on a block to set the positions, then right click on the maid to register the positions. $(br2)When the maid home mode is enabled, they will work within that area.
Special Last Slot

The last slot in the top row of the maid's inventory will have a special display effect:$(li)Banner: The corresponding Banner is displayed on the maid's back$(li)Weapon: The corresponding weapon is displayed on the maid's back$(li)Plants: The corresponding plants are displayed above the maid's head
Banner display effect
Maid's Meal
The maid can eat while working or injured to increase her favorability or restore her health.$(br2)Please put food in their mainhand or offhand!
When a maid is on an idle schedule, they will look for nearby picnic mats to eat, which will greatly increase their favorability.$(br2)Please serve them a delicious meal!
Servant Bell

The servant bell can retrieve marked maids back one by one. If the maid is on an unloaded chunk, it can also prompt you where the maid is.$(br2)Hold this item and right click the maid to mark the maid!
Chisel & Statues
Right-click a clay block with a chisel to make statues of different sizes. Currently supports 1x1x1, 1x1x2, 2x2x4, 3x3x6 sizes.

The player needs to hold a photo of the maid in their offhand, with the mainhand holding the chisel, then right-click the lower left corner of the multi-block structure to engrave the maid in the photo.
Garage Kit
The fire roasted 1x1 size statue can be converted into it.
Shrine Lamp

The shrine lamp is a good decoration and has certain practical functions. Right click on the upper part of the shrine lamp to open the GUI. The player can store their power points here.$(br2)The shrine lamp is also a weapon.

The player can also select an effect to bring to the surrounding range of maids at the cost of consuming power points.$(br2)The shrine lamp is also a good tool for automatically collecting power points. It can automatically collect power points within 6 blocks and store them.
Trumpet

A tool used to recall the maid, right-click to use. $(br2)$(4)$(l)Note: This item can only recall the maid on a loaded chunk. From a technical point of view, there is currently NO WAY to recall the maid on an unloaded chunk.
Custom Cushion

The custom cushion is a purely decorative item, placed directly on the ground by right-clicking. Crouch left-click to destroy it, right-click to sit, crouch right-click to open the GUI to switch the cushion model.

The maid will automatically sit on a cushion when they are close enough. Crouch right-click the maid to make them stand up.$(br2)The cushion model can also be completely customized. You can choose from a list or you can quickly add a custom model through the model package.
Command
$(#f00)/tlm$(): This is the command provided by the mod$(br2)You can use it to set power, maid num, or reload the model package.
Extinguisher

Required to be in the maid's mainhand when in extinguishing mode so allow her to put out fires. Can be in the maid's offhand in attack mode to deal extra damage to fire-immune mobs. Cannot be used by players.
Maid Bed

The player can sleep, and naturally the maid can also sleep. During sleep schedule, the maid will to look for a surrounding bed to sleep in.$(br2)The sleeping maid will no longer be attacked by hostile creatures, and the maid's GUI also cannot be opened.
Maid sleeping in bed.
Power Point
Right-click to throw. Drops power points in experience form.$(br2)You can find power points in dungeon loot chests.
Camera & Photo

Carry a maid across dimensions or at a distance is a hassle. The camera was created to make that easier. $(br2)Just take a photo of your maid with the camera and turn her into a photo, then hold the photo and right click on a block to release her again.
Model Switcher
Used in creative mode, mainly designed for servers, can be used to display maid models

First you need to right-click on a chosen maid with the item in your hand, then place it on the ground and open the GUI to set the list of models you want to show.$(br2)Then send a redstone signal on its left or right sides to switch the chosen maid's model.
Chair Hitbox Displayer
Crouch while holding this item to show the collision box of chairs.
Favorability Tool
Right click on a maid to change the maid's favorability. Creative mode only.
Fox Scroll
Use to find a maid or their tombstone.
Granite Inari Fox
Granite Inari Fox can prevent the spawning of maid fairies.$(br2)The prevent range is a square range, and the Y direction covers everything from the lowest point to the highest point!
Gomoku
You can play gomoku with the maid, and winning will increase the maid's favorability.$(br2)After the player wins multiple times, the maid's gomoku skills will also increase.
Maid's Joy
Several recreational items that a maid will play on during her idle schedule, which can increase her favorability. Includes the Keyboard, Bookshelf, and Computer.
Shrine
Has a low probability of appearing in loot chests. Can be used to revive a maid inside a film by consuming the player's health.
Broom

The broom is a portable vehicle, but it requires the player and the maid to use it together.$(br2)Use the mouse to control the direction up or down, and WASD to control the movement forward, backward, left, and right.
Picnic Basket

The picnic basket can store food. It also can be turned into a picnic mat by right-clicking a block to place it on the ground. Needs sufficient space to place. Up to four maids will enjoy sitting on a picnic when they are idle.
Gohei And Danmaku

The gohei is a normal melee weapon.$(br2)The maid holding a gohei will shoot danmaku while on the danmaku task.$(br2)Gohei can be attached with 2 vanilla enchantments: Multishot and Quick Charge, and can also be attached with 3 new enchantments added by this mod!
The gohei also is an important tool for building a multi-block altar.
Multi-Block Altar

The altar is the multi-block structure required for crafting in this mod.$(br2)The altar's recipes can be obtained through JEI. Crafting it also requires the player's $(l:overview/power_point)power point$().
Use the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$() to right click on the red wool located 4 blocks high in the center left, to build the altar.
Multi-Block Altar

You can place items by right-clicking on the top of the six oak pillars of the altar. You can remove an item by right-clicking empty-handed.$(br2)When all required items are placed and the player has enough power points, the altar will start crafting.$(br2)The craft can be interrupted due to the lack of power, but the player can right click again to re-trigger the craft after getting more power.
Power Point

The power point is an important resource for this mod, which can be obtained by killing the $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)maid fairy$().$(br2)Can be used for $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar$() crafting.

When you hold a $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$(), you can see your power point amount in the upper left corner of the game screen. $(br2)The maximum amount of power points is 5, and getting more will not increase the amount. $(br2)The maid can pick up power points, and will repair all items in her inventory that have the $(5)Mending$() enchantment.
Touhou Project
The Touhou Project is a Japanese doujin game series by Sole Team Shanghai Alice member ZUN that specializes in Shoot 'em Ups.
Touhou Wiki
World Spawn

This mod adds one mob. $(br2)The loot dropped from of this mob are important crafting ingredients.$(br2)The chance of spawning hostile creatures in this mod can be modified in the configuration file. When set to 0, these monsters will be prohibited from spawning.
Spawns in any biome at night. It will fly and shoot danmaku to attack players or iron golems.
There is a chance that a maid will spawn in pillager outpost cages.
Make Custom Model

Making a custom model pack is very simple. All you need is Blockbench, which is a free and open source software that is easy to use. $(br2)The custom model also supports Bedrock Edition animations, as well as a rich set of molang variables.
I specially designed a plugin for making model packs with Blockbench, visit the link below to learn how to install the plugin.
Open Link
Download Custom Model
You can find the model pack download button at the bottom of the maid GUI.

Click it to open the download GUI & choose to download the model packs that you like.$(br2)The model packs are all made by other players. If you also want to publish your custom model pack, you can click the button below to join our Discord group and submit your model pack.
Discord Link
Vanilla Changes
We modified the slime model to the yukkuri.
We also changed the textures of Experience Orbs, Bottle 'O Enchanting, and Totem of Undying. $(br2)These can all be turned off in the configuration file.
Favorability

Higher favorability will increase the maid's health and attack.$(br2)improving maid favorability:$(li)When the maid is in idle schedule, she will play with the keyboard, computer, bookshelf or gomoku.$(li)Maid sleeping.$(br2)Reducing maid favorability:$(li)Death of the maid.
